attributes.action: stop all imports of cat and dog fur in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
2 million cats and dogs are raised under cruel conditions and then skinned alive, strangled or stabbed solely for their furs and skins.  There is no cultural aspect of this - it is purely for money.
Dog and cat fur is imported into the UK under the customs classification of "other fur" which can be used on such items as lining in ski boots and gloves, trim on parkas, full coats, covering sleeping cat figurines.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
